dcterms:creator: S. Rabanus
A. Kruijt
M. Tagliani
dcterms:description: VinKo is a spoken corpus based on crowd-sourced audio recordings designed to provide relevant linguistic information about the minority languages and dialects spoken in the area between Innsbruck and the Po Valley.
dcterms:title: VinKo (Varieties in Contact)

dcterms:creator: E. Bidese
A. Tomaselli
dcterms:description: AThEME focuses on language synchronization and the modeling of linguistic continua across different regions, particularly north and south of the Brenner Pass.
dcterms:title: AThEME (Advancing the European Multilingual Experience)

dcterms:description: Linguistic data collected from various localities in North-Eastern Italy, focusing on the presence of Germanic syntactic features in Romance dialects.
